title: LOL BUGPATCH DELITE
body: every now and then riot makes a patch that is so messy and causes game to go uber/taxi with trouble for so many people its unreal out of my 5-6 years as a LOL player (not this account )  it hasnt changed every few months they put a raw disgusting patch for update usually a patch or 2 after new champion release. i love LoL im addicted but riot you are killing us and the game

replies.body: I'm not quite sure what issues you're experiencing, so if you could clarify, I'd be happy to assist you further.
